title: Frankie being Frankie representing Puerto Rico at the World Baseball Classic

organizations.name: carlos correa usa today sports usa

text:
Mar 22, 2017 at 11:22a ET 0 USA TODAY Sports Francisco Lindor representing Puerto Rico at the WBC ©Icon Sportswire (A Division of XML Team Solutions) All Rights Reserved contact: info@iconsportswire.com http://iconsportswire. Brian Rothmuller/Icon Sportswire Teaming up with other stars like Carlos Correa USA TODAY Sports USA TODAY Sports Frankie and Puerto Rico beat the Netherlands in the semifinals ©Icon Sportswire (A Division of XML Team Solutions) All Rights Reserved contact: info@iconsportswire.com http://iconsportswire. Adam Davis/Icon Sportswire And now will take on the United States for the WBC title ©Icon Sportswire (A Division of XML Team Solutions) All Rights Reserved contact: info@iconsportswire.com http://iconsportswire. Brian Rothmuller/Icon Sportswire Just like with the Indians, Frankie has been a key contributor for Puerto Rico Orlando Jorge Ramirez Orlando Ramirez-USA TODAY Sports He's hitting .435 USA TODAY Sports Robert Hanashiro-USA TODAY Sport Has 10 hits... USA TODAY Sports Robert Hanashiro-USA TODAY Sport 2 home runs... Kelvin Kuo Kelvin Kuo-USA TODAY Sports 7 runs scored... ©Icon Sportswire (A Division of XML Team Solutions) All Rights Reserved contact: info@iconsportswire.com http://iconsportswire. John Cordes/Icon Sportswire And 4 RBI All with that signature Frankie flair and love of the game 
Can't wait to see you back in a Tribe uni.
